title: A Top Hospital Opens Up to Chinese Herbs as Medicines
author: Sumathi Reddy
description: The Cleveland Clinic is a surprising venue for the dispensing of herbs, a practice that has yet to make inroads in the U.S. because of a lack of evidence they are effective.
